metis.assumptions

Source: R/metis.assumptions.R
metis.assumptions.Rd

This function loads holds the different assumptions used throughout the metis package.

metis.assumptions()

Value

A list of assumptions

Details

List of Assumptions

  • GCAMbaseYear,

  • convEJ2MTOE,

  • convEJ2TWh,

  • convEJ2GW,

  • convEJ2GWh,

  • convGW_kW,

  • conv_C_CO2,

  • conv_MT_GT,

  • hydro_cap_fact,

  • hydro_cost_GW,

  • convUSD_1975_2010,

  • convUSD_1975_2015,

  • conv1975USDperGJ22017USDperMWh,

  • conv1975USDperGJ22017USDperMBTU,

  • convertGgTgMTC,

  • GWP,

  • US52=US52,

  • US49=US49

Examples

library(metis)
a<-metis.assumptions()
a # will give full list of assumptions
#> $GCAMbaseYear
#> [1] 2010
#> 
#> $convEJ2MTOE
#> [1] 23.88459
#> 
#> $convEJ2TWh
#> [1] 277.7778
#> 
#> $convEJ2GW
#> [1] 31.70979
#> 
#> $convEJ2GWh
#> [1] 277777.8
#> 
#> $convGW_kW
#> [1] 1e+06
#> 
#> $conv_C_CO2
#> [1] 3.666667
#> 
#> $conv_MT_GT
#> [1] 0.001
#>
